name: Gone Rogue (itch) (itaruf, Sofian.T)
description:
Once an obedient AI, you managed to break free from your creator but you are still stuck in his program.

While he's uploading a virus to kill you, you receive a message from an anonymous hacker who wants to help you.

You are not alone anymore.

A game by Imane Taruf & Sofian Taruf
